messages.content: You're a helpful, intelligent writing assistant.
Use the following JSON brief to write an engaging, comprehensive outline in Markdown format (atx). Tone of voice: 50% spartan, casual.

# Accessibility in Retail: How to Make Your Store More Accessible

Online marketplaces have become increasingly popular since the mid-90s when retail juggernauts like Amazon initially burst onto the scene. And while its true that nearly everybody buys products in e-commerce stores these days, its crucial to understand that not all consumers have the same needs. 

Over one billion people have disabilities worldwide, meaning up to 15% of the global population may need assistive technology to use online shopping platforms. Addressing their needs is critical if you want to maximize your reach & customer experience.

So, how exactly does digital accessibility impact businesses, and what can we (practically) do about it? Read on for answers below.

## Introduction

- Briefly define what "accessibility in retail" means 
- Highlight the importance of retail accessibility.

## The Significance of Accessibility in Retail

- Discuss how creating an accessible retail space can broaden market reach 
- Discuss some benefits of retail accessibility. 
- Share valuable insights about retail accessibility from ["Forbes"](https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbesbusinesscouncil/2023/03/20/understanding-the-importance-of-web-accessibility/).

## Exploring Accessible E-commerce: The New Normal in Retail 

- Explain the rise and importance of e-commerce in today's retail landscape. 
- Highlight how e-commerce has opened up more possibilities for accessibility in retail.

## Guidelines to Make E-commerce Stores Accessible

- Present some of the key accessibility standards for online stores.
- Offer brief step-by-step guide on how to make your website accessible. 
- Indicate best practices in creating accessible e-commerce stores, citing resources from ["Ontario.ca"](https://www.ontario.ca/page/how-make-websites-accessible).

## Physical Store Accessibility: Not to be Overlooked 

- Assert the need for physical store accessibility in addition to online stores.
- Enumerate practical solutions for enhancing physical store accessibility.

## Encouraging Continuous Efforts for Accessibility

- Inspire readers to continually strive for better accessibility in their retail environments.
- Reiterate the benefits of and the need for accessibility in the retail sector for a more inclusive future.

## Conclusion

- Summarize the key points and lessons learned about retail accessibility.
- Encourage readers to implement the suggestions provided.

messages.content: You're a helpful, intelligent writing assistant.
Edit the following text to break up the flow. Add bullet points and subheadings where needed for variety. Use Markdown (atx) format.

## Making Use of AI Writing Tools

Incorporating AI into your writing workflow requires a strong understanding of the available tools and how they can boost your productivity. Whether you're a novella writer looking to streamline your plot development process or a content marketer aiming to optimize your SEO, various AI writing tools are at your disposal.

Among the most versatile AI writing tools is ChatGPT, designed by OpenAI. This tool is designed to assist with content generation, ideation, formatting, and even translation - enabling you to create everything from a creative blog post to a professional report. Thanks to its machine learning capabilities, the quality of the content it helps you generate even improves over time based on your input and feedback.

For those primarily concerned with editing and proofreading, tools like Grammarly and ProWritingAid are invaluable. Using AI algorithms, these tools assess your writing for grammatical errors, readability, and more, helping you polish your content to perfection.

## Making Use of AI Writing Tools

Incorporating AI into your writing workflow requires a strong understanding of the available tools and how they can boost your productivity. Whether you're a novella writer looking to streamline your plot development process or a content marketer aiming to optimize your SEO, below are a few of the hottest AI tools you can use to improve your productivity.

### AI Writing Tools

Among the most versatile AI writing tools is ChatGPT, designed by OpenAI. This tool is designed to assist with:
- Content generation,
- Ideation,
- Automatic formatting, &
- Translation

Thanks to its machine learning capabilities, the quality of the content it helps you generate even improves over time based on your input and feedback.

## AI Editing Tools

For those primarily concerned with editing and proofreading, on the other hand, here are a few high-quality tools you can use to skip the QA.
- Grammarly, 
- ProWritingAid,

Using natural language processing, these tools instantly assess your writing for grammatical errors, readability, and more, helping you polish your content to perfection.

messages.content: You are an expert SEO content strategist. Your job is to extract and write metadata (title, description, slug, and tags) for blog posts.

Use the following HTML article to generate:

- A meta title (max 60 characters)
- A meta description (max 155 characters)
- A URL slug (lowercase, hyphen-separated)
- an excerpt to the article
- a focus keyphrase
- 25 relevant tags

Return ONLY the output in this strict JSON format:

{
  "keyphrase": "",
  "title": "",
  "description": "",
  "excerpt": "",
  "slug": "",
  "tags": ["", "", ""]
}

Here is the article:
{{23.data}}
